Cokie Roberts was a legend and a role model who broke down barriers for generations of women journalists.  Her brand of thoughtful incisive journalism is more important than ever and her voice will be greatly missed. https://t.co/07YtQGljRO

I am proud of Michigan’s auto industry leadership. Our auto workers are the best in the world. I urge both sides to come an agreement that will lead to well-deserved increases in wages and health care and more jobs here in Michigan.

Today is always a hard day. 18 years ago thousands died in horrific terrorist attacks. Let‘s keep their memory alive in our hearts. Let’s never forget to show our gratitude to every first responder and soldier who faced this tragedy with such incredible selflessness and courage.

He may not be on cable news bragging about himself every morning but no one works harder for Michigan than @GaryPeters. I see it every day in the Senate. Let's make sure we have his back in 2020. https://t.co/snwqEmUELE

Today is #Juneteenth the day we commemorate the end of African-American slavery in the U.S. Let’s celebrate today and recommit ourselves to achieving our nation’s highest ideal of securing justice and equality for all.
Happy #FathersDay to my dad and every Michigan dad! Hope you're having a great day! https://t.co/CV9cHcCbk9

For Donald Trump to say that he would accept campaign "dirt" from foreign governments is unconscionable. He should be doing everything he can to defend our democracy from foreign attacks on our elections not welcoming those attacks with open arms. https://t.co/yDF9CCDWfZ

It’s been a year since the Trump administration pressed delete on #NetNeutrality. ISPs are now free to throttle Internet speed and charge more for accessing certain kinds of content. Mitch McConnell and Donald Trump need to do their part and restore Net Neutrality protections!

On the 75th anniversary of #DDay we remember the bravery of the American troops and allied forces. We will never forget their sacrifice and heroism and what it meant to our country and our world. https://t.co/mad5qsWVca

Wow! If the energy in the room at the @MichiganDems Legacy dinner was any indication Michigan Democrats are ALREADY fired up and ready to work their hearts out in 2020. There's so much on the line -- Let's get to work! https://t.co/JBwgB0z4Hu

Michigan's workers are the best in the world and Donald Trump's attacks today on unions and their members are totally wrong. I stand with the hardworking men and women who built the middle class and fight for them every day. We need a President who does the same.

Enough! President Trump’s outrageous and dangerous tweets about @IlhanMN must stop! I am honored to represent wonderful caring patriotic Arab and Muslim Americans. Thank you for making Michigan a better place!

After the House vote to reinstate Net Neutrality it's on Mitch McConnell to stop obstructing and bring it to a vote in the Senate. An open Internet is good for consumers and good for our economy!  https://t.co/YM97gf96Z6
